metadata.Title: CVE-2023-41910 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: An issue was discovered in lldpd before 1.0.17. By crafting a CDP PDUpacket with specific CDP_TLV_ADDRESSES TLVs, a malicious actor can remotelyforce the lldpd daemon to perform an out-of-bounds read on heap memory.This occurs in cdp_decode in daemon/protocols/cdp.c.

criterions.comment: lldpd package in esm-apps/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
